resources.string: Report technical issues or suggest new features
code that will be checked for incoming messages
select the sound that should be played
In order for this application to work, you must grant permission to receive and read sms messages
Application will not work properly until you grant permissions
You must select the application you want to run
This command requires root privileges. If your phone is rooted, grant SmsControl permission to use this command\nYou can do this in settings
In order for this application to work, you must grant permission to read phone state
This command will not work until you grant permissions
This command requires SEND SMS privileges.\nPermission will be used to send the list of commands to the sender\'s number
This command requires SEND SMS privileges.\nPermission will be used to send information about phone to the sender\'s number

This command require LOCATION permission to get your phone location. 
For this command to perform its task, you must have location enabled!! 

If you grant ROOT access, it will try to turn your GPS on and get your localization even if it's disabled. 

If all the above options are not available, the last known location will be taken (if available)
The location could not be determined
List of numbers from which messages will be ignored
Are you sure you want to delete \'%1$s\' number from blacklist?

The general command pattern is:
			@securityCode command

Example:
			@1234 wifiOn

Commands can occur in two variants:
 1.Without argument: @1234 wifiOn
 2.With argument @1234 playSound 10

(Arguments are never required, commands always have default values which will be used when the user doesn't set an argument)

Caution!!
Command that require root privilege may not work on all devices because android api does not officially support it
Messages that come from numbers added to this list will be ignored regardless of whether the message is correct or not
Here you can see all actions taken with the help of sms messages
Are you sure you want to clear all logs?
Set sound level (Ringtone and music) to max
Set sound level (Ringtone and music) to 0
Determine which sound level suits you, You must add argument for the sound level
Play selected song, if you are not select any song, it will be played default ringtone.\nYou can add additional argument for the time(in seconds) the music should play
Sends to the sender of the message the list of commands that are enabled
Sends information about the status of the phone and its sensors to the sender of the message
Tries to determine the location of the phone and send it to the sender of the message.\nYou can add additional argument for the time(in seconds) for which the location should be determined
Run the application that was previously selected, if no application has been selected, the message will be ignored
Turns on mobile data\nCaution!\nThis command need root privilege
Turns off mobile data\nCaution!\nThis command need root privilege
Restart your phone\nCaution!\nThis command need root privilege
Shutdown your phone\nCaution!\nThis command need root privilege
You cannot use this command more often than every 30s
Icons used in loading screen are made by photo3idea_studio from www.flaticon.com
